content: .i can guess some of you already know what i am trying to talk aboutfor anyone wondering please read the wiki article firsthttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_pokerafter a decade of research how to solve this problem finally i am readyto step forward and monetise my efforts for fun of course Â if you google 'mental game' you will get at least 10 academic documentsusing all kind of modern mathematics and cryptography/logic protocols inorder to solve this problemyes there are already many solutions but none as good as mine^^this is my huge claim - i knowlets mental fight to prove if i am right or wrong ,welcome all--------------------disclaimer - my english knowledge is far from perfect i know butmy mind is wired a little diferent so even when i write in my nativelanguage (greek) you will notice flaws tooso it will be posible some of my scripts will fail to make sense at onceplease dont quit reading me,ask clarifications preferably in public--------------------Elias.C 2023UPDATE 1
